message: Hello! I have a great product for sale for $100. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll be happy with it. What do you think?
I'm willing to take a chance on your product.  Since there's no track record yet, I'm hoping for the best!
Hi! I'm selling a great product for $100.  I have one sale under my belt already, so you can see that I'm a reliable seller.  What do you say?

Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm hesitant to buy without knowing the quality of the product, especially since the previous buyer bought a low-quality product. I'd like to see more evidence of your product quality before making a purchase.
